introduction: Instead of repaying a debt, Jungsik is asked to kill Jaeyoung, a woman who seems to be in a similar situation to him. Jeongsik, who has never killed a person before, sees an opportunity to kill Jaeyoung, but it's not easy to follow through. The film features a delicate performance from actor CHO Byeongkyu and a short but intense performance from actor MOON Sang-hoon.
